synopsis.text: As autumn paints the town red, a heartbroken mother weeps beside her lifeless child. Desperate to reclaim her lost joy, she clings to the boy's remaining shadow and races through the moonlit streets. In her quest to revive her son, she strikes a deal with an enigmatic old man cloaked in darkness. This poignant tale of maternal love and sacrifice unfolds as a masterpiece from the Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation. Prepare for an emotional journey as the mother navigates the depths of despair to bring her child back to life.
